sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnindvdlinfopolicy ( INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_ID /* */ , INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_CN /* */ , INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_AGRE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_NM /* */ ) VALUES ( #indvdlInfoPolicyId# /* */ , #indvdlInfoPolicyCn# /* */ , #indvdlInfoPolicyAgreAt# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #indvdlInfoPolicyNm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnindvdlinfopolicy SET INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_ID=#indvdlInfoPolicyId# /* */ , INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_CN=#indvdlInfoPolicyCn# /* */ , INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_AGRE_AT=#indvdlInfoPolicyAgreAt# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_NM=#indvdlInfoPolicyNm# /* */ WHERE INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_ID=#indvdlInfoPolicyId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_ID /* */ , INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_CN /* */ , INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_AGRE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_NM /* */ FROM comtnindvdlinfopolicy WHERE INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_ID=#indvdlInfoPolicyId# /* */

SELECT INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_ID /* */ , INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_CN /* */ , INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_AGRE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_NM /* */ FROM comtnindvdlinfopolicy WHERE 1=1
INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_CN LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnindvdlinfopolicy WHERE 1=1
INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_CN LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
